item.title: Gadwal BRS office hosts Vijay Divas celebrations
item.description:
<![CDATA[The District BRS Party Office in Gadwal town witnessed grand celebrations of “Vijay Divas” on December 9, commemorating the historic day that marked Telangana’s statehood. The event was organized under the guidance of BRS Working President KTR, with party leaders and activists participating enthusiastically.
The celebrations began with garlanding the statue of Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar and performing milk abhishekam to the Telangana Thalli statue, followed by a similar tribute at the portrait of T...]]>
item.author: Metro India
